mapper.select: SELECT rh.`id` AS id, rh.`order_code` AS orderCode, rh.`submit_date` AS sumitDate, rh.send_code AS sendCode, rh.send_name AS sendName, rh.receive_name AS receiveName, rh.receive_phone AS receivePhone, rh.receive_address AS receiveAddress, p.`code` AS pCode, p.`name` AS pName, rd.`expect_pcs_qty` AS expectPcsQty, rd.`actual_pcs_qty` AS actualPcsQty, rh.`scan_begin_time` AS scanBeginTime, rh.`upload_time` AS uploadTime FROM rdc_out_header rh LEFT JOIN rdc_out_detail rd ON rh.`id` = rd.`header_id` LEFT JOIN product p ON rd.`product_id` = p.`id` WHERE rh.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rdc_out_detail( id, header_id, product_id, expect_pcs_qty, actual_pcs_qty ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{headerId}, #{productId}, #{expectPcsQty}, #{actualPcsQty} )
